page.title: 12Post Office
page.content: The Post Office is the only shop in our area. The Post Office is closed at twelve noon on Saturdays.My mum is in charge.There has been a Post Office in Ulpha for eighty years.In the shop we sell ice cream,soft drinks,frozen foods,tinned foods,dairy products and sweets. The Post Bus comes up every day and carries people as well as mail.Three post men are Ronnie,George and Alan and they are very helpful and look in on the old people.They empty the post box in Ulpha at 12 and 5.The post bus has a thirty mile journey every morning except Sunday,and it takes five hours.
